page.title: 07ELY POLICE STATION
page.content: Visit to Ely Police Station. On the 10th of June we went to Ely Police Station all our class went. Mr Brind went into see the Police. Then we went in. We went upstairs into the eating room.When we all got in there Mr Brind introduced Mrs Holmes and Miss Gill to the policemen. They asked if we wanted to go and have a look at the computer. Then we went into the computer room. Stephen Taylor was working on the computer, if you give the registration number of the car it can find out the owner of the car . We went to talk to the detective CID officer.He told us that if we want to be a Police Officer you've got to be fit. You have got to be 5 foot 8 in height and you must not have been in trouble with the Police once.He told us that there cont.
